name: java image tools
short_description:
Goal: To build a robust java image toolset capable of providing fast and easy image analysis and cosmetic fixes that can be used in almost any application. To improve the world by giving a free open-source way to get the job done, from edge detection to skew and more. 

Description: A java image tools set that has edge detection, gaussian blur, sharpen, denoise, crop, deskew, and a wide variety of other features. If you want to be an active member, send me an email. The project has been under the Apache license since April 2013.
summary: Image Tool set with Edge Detection, Gaussian Blur, Sharpen, etc.
